page.title: 04The Duffryn Estate
page.content: I live at{Partridge Way.} The design of the house is good. The bedrooms are square, rectangular and triangular. In a three bedroom house there two big bedrooms and one small one. The kitchens are big, the living rooms are quite big. The hall way is medium. At the back of my house there is a wood, a big grass area and our school. There are not many playing places in {Partridge Way. }There used to be a fort there. It is now a playing field. There is only one big and good park which is in {Sandpiper {Way.} More places and parks should be built for little children to play in. There are a thousand houses on the {Duffryn Estate.} This estate won a design award when it opened in 1976.
